boardgame.name: Tal der Könige
El Valle de los Reyes
Valley of the Kings
boardgame.description: When you die, you can take it with you!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Take on the role of Egyptian nobles at the time of the pharaohs, preparing for death and burial in the Valley of the Kings. Players want to fill their tombs with food, canopic jars, statues, amulets and other treasures, and to do so they acquire cards that are laid out in the shape of a pyramid; purchase cards at the base of the pyramid, and it _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;crumbles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; to bring cards higher in the pyramid to the base where they can be bought. The pyramid resets each round with new offerings._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You score only for cards that you remove from your deck and stash in your tomb, so if you keep using valuable cards for their effects and don't entomb them before the game ends, you could lose out on big points! Whoever collects the most valuable artifacts in her tomb wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 Golden Geek Best Card Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Big Fun in a Little Box with Shawn: Pixel Tactics _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Valley of the Kings
Episode 12 - Dealing With Acquisition Disorder on a Budget
Episode 30 - When All You Need is a Deck of Cards
Episode 32 -- Gum-sized Games and Ancient Tombs
Episode 48 The Geeks Get Lost In The Valley Of The Kings
Episode 76-- Spiel des Jahres chat and What we have been playing With guests Joel Eddy and Paul Owen
Episode 77 Origins preview, Buonocore drops by, and Xmen chat (spoilers)
MN 0149 Small Deck Builders: Valley of the Kings, Dale of Merchants, Xenon Profiteer
The Game Pit: Episode 28 - Picking Over the bones
boardgame.boardgameintegration: Valley of the Kings: Last Rites
Valley of the Kings: Last Rites

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: English first edition Publisher: Alderac Entertainment Group
Played a couple of times but like new!

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5381) In Valley of the Kings, 2-4 players are Egyptian nobles at the time of the pharaohs, preparing for their death and burial in the Valley of the Kings. In the Egyptian religion, when you die you can take it with you! Egyptians therefore stocked their tombs with food, shabti (statuettes of servants who will work for them in the afterlife), canopic jars (to preserve their organs), statues of the gods, household items, and amulets. You compete with the other players to accumulate the best artifacts for your tomb. At the end of the game, you score the artifacts stored there - the player with the most victory points wins!

Alderac Entertainment Group (AEG5381) In Valley of the Kings, 2-4 players are Egyptian nobles at the time of the pharaohs, preparing for their death and burial in the Valley of the Kings. In the Egyptian religion, when you die you can take it with you! Egyptians therefore stocked their tombs with food, shabti (statuettes of servants who will work for them in the afterlife), canopic jars (to preserve their organs), statues of the gods, household items, and amulets. You compete with the other players to accumulate the best artifacts for your tomb. At the end of the game, you score the artifacts stored there - the player with the most victory points wins!
Valley of the Kings Nick: English first edition Publisher: Alderac Entertainment Group
